sentences.en: All lead castings were produced at first by hand in many cases from single cavity molds.
sentences.cn: 起初所有的铅铸件都是手工生产的,而且在许多情况下都是使用单腔模具.

sentences.en: I have no cavities (= no holes in my teeth ) .
In Section 6 . 11 the cylindrical cavity problem is discussed.
sentences.cn: 在第6.11节中节中,将讨论柱形空腔问题.

sentences.en: No cavity is demonstrable ( planigrams are usually required ).
sentences.cn: 无空洞可见 ( 一般需断层摄影 ).

sentences.en: Put herbs inside the body cavity of the fish.
Put stuffing into the cavity and truss the bird.
sentences.cn: 把填料放到腔内，把鸟的腿和翅膀扎紧。

sentences.en: Standard emitters are conventionally high - temperature cavity radiators.
sentences.cn: 标准发射体通常是高温辐射腔.

sentences.en: The cavity in the tower is filled with high - strength concrete.
sentences.cn: 在塔内的空洞部分填满 高强 混凝土.

sentences.en: The dentist carefully located the filling in the cavity.
sentences.cn: 牙医小心地把填塞的东西放入牙洞里.

sentences.en: The embryo lives in the amniotic cavity.
The fluid cavity should be smooth, continuous, and symmetrical to minimize fluid torque.
sentences.cn: 为了减省液体力矩,液体腔应该是光滑的, 连续的和对称的.

sentences.en: The stomach is a large pouch located high in the abdominal cavity.
sentences.cn: 胃是一只位于腹腔高处的大袋.

sentences.en: The two cleaved facets define the Fabry - Perot Cavity.
sentences.cn: 这两个解理面限定了法布里?珀罗光腔.

sentences.en: The various harmonics are in resonance in this cavity to different degrees.
sentences.cn: 在口腔中,各种谐音的共鸣程度不同.

sentences.en: This reduced body cavity is called a hemocoel.
sentences.cn: 这种缩小的体腔称为血腔.

sentences.en: Through this incision, the abdominal cavity is distended with carbon dioxide gas.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳气体通过这个切口进入，造成腹腔肿胀。

words.tran_cn: 使凹陷，使塌落；在…挖洞穴

phrases.tran_cn: 共振腔；空腔谐振器，呼吸腔

trans.tran_en: a hole or space inside something
